children.subject: I have the same question. Alternatively, what if you gap 4th year spring semester and graduate in the following fall? Would you be eligible to apply to 5th yr masters?

history.content:
From the "Eligibility" section on the 5th year master's webpage for this last admissions cycle: Applicants must ... have graduated in Fall 2019 or whose anticipated graduation will be in Spring 2020. 

So my understanding is that you are eligible to start the program in Fall N if you graduate in Fall N-1 or Spring N.

children.subject: If I plan to graduate in Summer 2021, would it still be possible to start the 5th year masters program the following Fall semester? The course I have to complete in the Summer is a requirement for my second major, so I will have completed the CS major and all of the L&S/University-wide requirements by Spring 2021. I'm really interested in completing the 5th year masters and I was on track to graduate by Spring 2021, but with all of the craziness with COVID, I had to rearrange my course plans a bit.
Nothing's stopping you from applying without research, but it is strongly recommended you have a professor who has agreed to be your research advisor for the 5th year at the time you apply.
are you even allowed to apply for 5th year masters without actual research yet?

history.content: I'm planning to extend one fall semester after my 4th year at Berkeley, will I still be eligible to apply for 5th year MS program? I may want to find an intern or do some research in the second half of the academic year.  If not, do I have to gap the fall semester, then graduate in Spring to be eligible? Thank you so much!
history.subject: 5th MS Application Eligibility
